remarks: Theorem scheme version of ~ scott0 .  The collection of all ` x ` of minimum rank such that ` ph ( x ) ` is true, is not empty iff there is an ` x ` such that ` ph ( x ) ` holds.  (Contributed by NM, 13-Oct-2003.)
statement:
scott0s $p |- ( E. x ph <-> { x | ( ph /\ A. y ( [. y / x ]. ph -> ( rank ` x ) C_ ( rank ` y ) ) ) } =/= (/) ) $.
$d ph y $.
$d x y $.
